1370: Folkero moved to Davids hof.A.9 after marriage.
Got married to Wijfgode at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Liudburgis, at age 19.
1371: Lost daughter Rabburgis when Rabburgis was 0 years old.
Wijfgode gave birth to their stillborn daughter Rabburgis in 1371.
1373: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Erkenradis, at age 22.
1374: Had a son with Wijfgode, Tiedeman, at age 23.
1376: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Katerina, at age 25.
1378: Lost daughter Erkenradis when Erkenradis was 6 years old.
1379: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Waldrada, at age 28.
Lost son Tiedeman when Tiedeman was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1381: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Hildegardis, at age 30.
1384: Lost daughter Hildegardis when Hildegardis was 4 years old.
1388: Lost daughter Katerina when Katerina was 13 years old.
1393: Lost daughter Waldrada when Waldrada was 15 years old.
